courseSectionInformation: Same as GE 520 and ME 546. Prerequisite: ECE 515 and MATH 444 or MATH 447.
description: Nonlinear dynamics, vector fields and flows, Lyapunov stability theory, regular and singular perturbations, averaging, integral manifolds, input-output and input-to-state stability, and various design applications in control systems and robotics. Same as GE 520 and ME 546. Prerequisite: ECE 515 and MATH 444 or MATH 447.
label: Analysis of Nonlinear Systems
